metadata.description: TWO COPS, AND ONE’S A ROBOT, ONLY THEY DON’T KNOW WHICH! BAFTA winner and writer on HBO’s award winning Veep, DAVID QUANTICK teams up with THE BULLETPROOF COFFIN’s SHAKY KANE on this migraine-inducing Pop Art Cop-Buddy one-shot set in a near-future Los Angeles. WARNING: Contains oversized patrol cars and perilous situations.
metadata.name: That's Because You're A Robot
